text:
These aren't executed with high frequency: every 60s for `poll_market_closure` and every 120s for `poll_account_balance`  so shouldn't make a huge difference to your requests count.

If that is enough to cause "too many requests"-type errors, then time may be better spent looking at how to combine your strategies under a smaller number of Flumine instances.

text:
Stepping back, you mentioned why anyone would offer 1.8 when not going to trade there. Two main reasons:
1. They get random juicy trades
2. They get queue priority as they were at price levels before anyone else.

elements.text: Stepping back, you mentioned why anyone would offer 1.8 when not going to trade there. Two main reasons:
They get random juicy trades
They get queue priority as they were at price levels before anyone else.
